item.description: For those interested and able to get out again on the courts, here are some possibilities: North Haven Racquet Club, 100 Elm Street, North Haven 203-239-5665 Friday nights, 7:30 - 10:30; $24. They say you can just show up. Milford Racquet Club, 580 Bridgeport Avenue, Milford 203-876-1776 Friday nights usually 8:30 - 11; this week 5 - 8; $30. Call to reserve. Clay courts, Old Greenwich. Usually Saturdays 6 - 8/8:30, but Friday nights during the holidays; $35. Email to reserve: patriktennis1@yahoo.com This is doubles play, occasionally an opportunity to play singles. Players have generally been 3.0 - 4.0 level.

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Weekend indoor tennis possibilities
